name: Leaderboard

runs.name: Highscores
runs.description: Get top 3 USA players (user names) ordered by their total scores (descending)

runs.name: Highscores (today's)
runs.description: Get top 3 USA players (user names) based on their today's scores

solutionSQL:
SELECT country, user_name, total_score as score FROM leaderboard
UNION ALL
SELECT country, user_name, -today_score as score FROM leaderboard
